description: Narrates the fight between a Super Hero and a Super Villain using a single prompt

parameters.name: winner_powers
parameters.description: The comma separated list of powers of the winner
parameters.defaultValue: Accelerated Healing, Agility, Astral Projection, Cloaking, Danger Sense, Durability, Electrokinesis, Energy Blasts, Enhanced Hearing, Enhanced Senses, Force Fields, Hypnokinesis, Illusions, Intelligence, Jump, Light Control, Marksmanship, Precognition, Psionic Powers, Reflexes, Stealth, Super Speed, Telekinesis, Telepathy, The Force, Weapons Master

parameters.name: winner_level
parameters.description: A number representing the level of the winner

parameters.name: loser_powers
parameters.description: The comma separated list of powers of the loser
parameters.defaultValue: Agility, Longevity, Marksmanship, Natural Weapons, Stealth, Super Strength, Weapons Master

parameters.name: loser_level
parameters.description: A number representing the level of the loser

parameters.name: winner_team
parameters.description: The team winning. Can be either 'heroes' or 'villains'

parameters.name: loser_team
parameters.description: The team winning. Can be either 'heroes' or 'villains'
